articles.description: A bid to turn Mission Beach and Dunk Island into a tourism hotspot is all but over with the man behind the scheme banned from fundraising and advertising financial products.
articles.content:
A bid to turn a small beachside area into Australia's next tourism mecca is all but over with the man behind the scheme banned from fundraising and advertising financial products for 20 years.
